NITAGUT is a store that specializes in men’s fashion.Focus on creating trendy, casual,classic and excellent men’s clothing!

We use American sizes and buyers can buy them with correct size.

And our clothes are mostly made of excellent fabrics.

We bring happiness and sunshine in life to men who pursue comfortable and fashion！

Imported
Machine Wash
NITAGUT Mens Shawl Collar Pullover Sweater is made of high quality fabric,The fabric is comfortable and stretchy ,so the stylish sweaters will provide a soft and warm wearing experience in cold weather and make you look elegant and casual!
The Cable Knit sweater for man is in US size. it’s very well made and will fit you perfectly.The casual sweater has a V-neck design,It also has Shawl Collar, Cable knit, Ribbed cuffs and hem, and Button decoration. The structure of the sweater itself is very good. There are no loose seams or uneven seams and the sweaters are woven with beautiful symmetrical patterns which will keep you getting compliments constantly!
Our v-neck soft pullover sweater is suitable for spring, autumn and winter ,It’s also a great addition to daily,business, work, party, dating, street strolling,travelling, sporting, skating,Halloween costume or any other leisure occasions. The long sleeve sweater for men can be a wonderful and considerate winter gift for your father, boyfriends,husband,son or your friends!
The Stylish Pullover sweater looks great with many daily dress.It can be paired with jeans to create a smart leisure look, or layer with jackets or coats to keep warm in cold days.Of course sports pants, casual pants, T-shirts and hoodies can also be perfectly matched with this sweater.This Cable Knit sweater comes in many colors, which also allows you to match all kinds of clothes you like!
In order to protect the fabric and to keep the the sweater comfortable,you can take the following ways to wash your sweater：dry clean or hand wash or Machine wash in Laundry Bag.After that,It’s better to lay the sweater flat to dry.Please don’t bleach and avoid putting this into the dryer after washing. otherwise the sweater may not keep its shape.Due to computer image resolution and monitor settings, the color may vary slightly depending on the website.thank you for your understanding!

[MATERIAL] – Super soft and fuzzy fleece lined material, this pullover tops will definitely keep you warm all day. Zipper sweatshirts for women lightweight warmth, breathable, cozy.
[FEATURES] – Athletic workout hoodies,women pullover sweatshirt,long sleeve with thumbhole ,1/2 zip up collar, solid color,cropped length,stand collar,fleece lined,kangaroo pockets,relaxed fit,crop top,with thumbholes.
[DESIGN] – Thumb hole hoodies can keep the sleeves from shifting or flapping in the wind, help keep your sleeves in place and hands warm, add a little more coverage in cold weather.An exaggerated fit that feels extra roomy.Not too short, not too long, just right around the waistband.

[LASLULU SERVICE] – We listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure quality, fit, and comfort.Each of your orders is the greatest encouragement to our shop, We’re always working to create the best for our customers.

LASLULU Womens Long Sleeve Fleece Sherpa Lined Zip Up Hooded Outwear with Pocket

This Fleece Lined Sweatshirts is Made of High Quality & Skin Friendly Material, Definitely Comfortable & Warm. It’s suitable for Spring, Autumn and Winter.

The lightweight fuzzy fabric is cozy and textural.

Features:

  • Zipped turtleneck, cozy oversize fit
  • Pullover design with kangaroo pocket on the front
  • Ultra soft pile fleece keep you warm and fashionable
  • It is a must-have in your wardrobe, and also is a Perfect Gift For A Friends, Wife, Mother, Aunt, Grandmother, Girlfriend Or Family.

If you are taller I’d recommend sizing up.

Tip: Due to many customers’ feedback that the leather zipper interface is easy to break, we replaced the zipper puller with a stronger metal zipper puller. We hope this will reduce customers’ worries about zipper pullers.

The fleece hooded cardigan is great for daily casual, work office, fall, winter holidays, going out, school, gym,vacation, party,it can also be a sweet Christmas Gift,New Year, Valentine’s Day to your love, friends or yourself.

Thumb Hole Design

Thumb hole hoodies can keep the sleeves from shifting or flapping in the wind, help keep your sleeves in place and hands warm, add a little more coverage in cold weather.

  • Wash with like colours
  • Machine wash cold
  • Do not bleach
  • Tumble dry low
  • Do not iron
  • Do not dry clean

LASLULU Womens Pullover Fleece Hoodie

Designed for women’s sports wear in autumn and winter.

  • Pair them with jeans, athletic pants,joggers,wide-leg pants, and tights, or pair them with an overcoat, jacket, or leather coat for a casual sport look.
  • In daily exercise, it is very easy to catch a cold after exercise. Wearing it will give you warmth. Plus the unique design of the clothes makes you more attractive.
  • Style: Casual / Sports / Athletic
  • Size Type: Regular Size
  • Season: Autumn/Winter
  • Closure: 1/2 Zipper
  • Gender: Women

I own 2 and will buy more. Incredibly comfortable, go with everything, and make you feel a bit more put together than tossing on a sweatshirt normally would. I get tons of compliments on it.

I love this hoodie! This was my second color to purchase. They are so comfortable and perfect for both athletic and casual wear.

Love the half so hoodie. So comfy and warm for my trips to the gym or out walking. All the pockets are also a big plus.
